bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of an inability of water/moisture transformation because of kidney depletion, or of moisture evil harming the kidneys, with water/moisture stagnation as a consequence. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 5: 久久變為水病，腎濕故也, “After a long time this changes into a water disease. The reason is kidney moisture ”.
② Pathological Condition of an oozing, moist scrotum. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry wu hui 烏喙：主風濕，丈夫腎 濕陰囊癢 , “It controls wind and moisture, and kidney moisture with scrotum itching in males”.
